sentences.sContent: The peace agreement came about through intense pressure by the international community.
sentences.sCn: 该和平协议是在国际社会的强大压力下产生的。

sentences.sContent: That came about when we went to New York last year.
sentences.sCn: 那件事发生在去年我们去纽约时。

trans.tranOther: When you say how or when something came about, you say how or when it happened
